useNavigateWithSearch.title: useNavigateWithSearch
useNavigateWithSearch.description: A custom hook that extends React Router DOM's `useNavigate`, allowing navigation between pages while retaining or manipulating search parameters.

features.preserveParams: Preserves existing search parameters when navigating
features.removeParams: Completely removes existing search parameters if needed
features.worksWith: Works with both string paths and location objects

apiDescription.noParams: The hook does not take any input parameters.
apiDescription.returnDescription: The destination path or location object to navigate to.
apiDescription.keepExistingParams: Determines whether to retain existing search parameters.
apiDescription.newParams: New search parameters to add or override.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: Navigate to a new page while keeping existing search parameters:

addingParams.title: Adding New Parameters
addingParams.description: Navigate and add new search parameters while preserving existing ones:

replacingParams.title: Replacing Parameters
replacingParams.description: Replace existing parameters with new ones:

withLocationObject.title: With Location Object
withLocationObject.description: Use with a location object instead of a string path:

codeComments.navigate: Navigate to a new page while keeping existing search parameters
codeComments.addOverride: Add or override new parameters while keeping existing ones
codeComments.keepExisting: Navigate to /products and keep existing URL parameters
codeComments.removeAll: Remove all parameters and add new ones
codeComments.navigateWithLocation: Navigate with location object and add new parameter
